name: As the world floods
description:
PLEASE READ BEFORE PLAYING:
I don't have any time left to work on this game before the jam ends, so I have to upload it early.

If you are looking for a complete experience, this prototype won't offer that yet. But you can still mess about with the stuff I managed to make.

I will be continuing development over the next few days, so if you like what you see, be sure to check back once it's done!
